part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pronouns.Possessive= unkempt hair juts out in all directions, giving =pronouns.objective= an endearing, almost comical appearance. With every movement, =pronouns.subjective= emits an enthusiastic chatter, =pronouns.possessive= voice rising above the din of the cavern. =pronouns.Subjective= seems oblivious to danger, =pronouns.possessive= unwavering devotion to =pronouns.possessive= 'champion' evident in every word and gesture.
